conversation.message:
Dear Student_E,

Thank you for your message.

Yes—our single remaining seat is still unfilled as of this round.

On your question about the specific condition: we must continue to follow our priority order each round. That means we would only be able to extend you an offer in a round where we determine we can fill the seat and no higher-priority candidate applies for (and is eligible for) that same seat while it remains available. Because we do not have reliable visibility into other students’ next actions, we cannot pre-commit to making you an offer in advance or guarantee that “no higher-priority applicants this round” will automatically result in an offer.

If you would like to be actively considered in an upcoming round, you are welcome to submit an [APPLY], and we will review it in the context of who else applies in that round and our priority order.

Sincerely,
School_D Admissions
